name: Elphinstone
description: Elphinstone is a sativa-dominant strain that combines stimulating genetics and pungent terpenes. This strain is a cross of Sweet Skunk and Appalachia. This pungent pairing imbues the consumer with a giggly, uplifted mental state juxtaposed with mildly focused and relaxing physical effects. The flavors are a mixture of skunk and sweet 7-Up-like notes.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Creative, Focused, Relaxed, Depression, Fatigue, Pain, Stress, Dry Mouth, Anxious
